mapper.select: SELECT r.rep_id, r.sts_id, r.reporter, r.reason, r.rep_result, r.sdate, r.edate, s.userid, s.state_id, s.state, s.ctfc_filename FROM report r LEFT JOIN activity_state s ON r.sts_id = s.state_id

SELECT r.rep_id, r.sts_id, r.reporter, r.reason, r.rep_result, r.sdate, r.edate, s.userid, s.state_id, s.state, s.ctfc_filename FROM report r LEFT JOIN activity_state s ON r.sts_id = s.state_id WHERE rep_id = #{repId}
UPDATE report SET rep_result = 1 WHERE rep_id = #{repId}
mapper.update: UPDATE report SET rep_result = #{repResult}, sts_id = (SELECT state_id FROM activity_state WHERE state = #{state}) WHERE rep_id = #{repId}
UPDATE activity_state AS a INNER JOIN report AS r ON a.state_id = r.sts_id SET a.state = #{state}, r.rep_result = 1, r.edate = current_timestamp() WHERE r.rep_id = #{repId};
update activity_state set state = -1, end_date = current_timestamp() where state = 1
mapper.select: select state_id, start_date, act_id, userid from activity_state s left join report r on s.state_id = r.sts_id where timestampdiff(hour, end_date, current_timestamp)>=48 and rep_result is null and state = 3
select count(*) from user_daily_mission where act_id = #{actId} and mission_date = #{startDate} and userid = #{userid}
select point from activity where act_id = #{actId }
mapper.update: update user set user_point = user_point + #{point} where userid = #{userid}
